info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued March 30 at 2:46PM CDT until March 30 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS New Orleans LA
info.description:
FFWLIX
The National Weather Service in New Orleans has extended the
* Flash Flood Warning for... Northeastern Jackson County in southern Mississippi...
* Until 430 PM CDT.
* At 246 PM CDT, Emergency Management reported impassable roads and significant flooding across northern Jackson County. Media videos and public videos on social media reports significant flooding as well. Between 6 and 8 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 4 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
This is a FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY for Wade and Hurley in Northeast Jackson County. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW!
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Emergency management reported.
IMPACT...This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW! Life threatening flash flooding of low water crossings, small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Hurley, Big Point and Wade.
info.instruction:
Move to higher ground now! This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR WADE AND HURLEY IN NORTHEAST JACKSON COUNTY
NWS: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY this area til 4:30 PM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY is in effect for this area until 4:30 PM CDT. This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR WADE AND HURLEY IN NORTHEAST JACKSON COUNTY
SNM: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 4:30 PM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 4:30 PM CDT. Esta es una situacion extremadamente peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
